definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Mass armies (in most societies) have been replaced by highly trained professional-technical military forces.
sentences.chinese: 數量龐大的軍隊已經被高技術軍隊取代。

sentences.english: The sun is a huge blazing ball, a million times larger than the earth.
sentences.chinese: 太陽是個龐大的熾燃火球，比地球大一百多萬倍。

sentences.english: A giant mulish horse team saved city of sweet day heart to set out from Qinghai.
sentences.chinese: 一支龐大的騾馬隊伍從青海省香日德城出發了。

sentences.english: It glittered in the gigantic sky.
China's mammoth economy may be downshifting.
sentences.chinese: 而規模龐大的中國經濟也可能在走下坡路。

sentences.english: SO it is caalled"PRECIOUS SHIP ". this majestic ship was the biggest seagoing vessel in the world at that time .
sentences.chinese: 它體勢龐大，巨無匹敵，是當時世界上最大的海船。

sentences.english: The mammoth buffalo roamed the plains.
sentences.chinese: 龐大的野牛羣出沒在這些平原上。

sentences.english: So what does the size of the Internet have to do with NAT?
sentences.chinese: 那麼面對日益龐大的因特網，NAT該做什麼呢？

sentences.english: Another big difference is the vastness of China’s economy.
sentences.chinese: 中國與日本的另一個不同之處在於其經濟的龐大。

sentences.english: The Type 037-I can be distinguished by its bulky radome positioned on the bridge roof ahead of the tripod mast.
sentences.chinese: 型以它位於艦橋頂部三腳桅杆上的龐大天線罩爲特點。

sentences.english: Massive, granite rock formations overlook beautiful, white-sand beaches.
sentences.chinese: 龐大的花崗岩陣列俯瞰美麗的白色沙灘。

sentences.english: The traditional music of the Hanis is a large music system.
sentences.chinese: 哈尼族傳統音樂文化是一個龐大的音樂體系。

sentences.english: Among the most spectacular sights are the great sea-bird colonies.
sentences.chinese: 龐大的海鳥羣是最壯觀的景象之一。

sentences.english: The big budgets astronomy projects bring can provide funds for education.
sentences.chinese: 天文學項目帶來的龐大預算可以爲教育提供資金。

sentences.english: As he proceeded, Bruneseau drew, directed, and completed considerable works;
sentences.chinese: 勃呂納梭邊走邊指示，經他領導結束了龐大的工程。

sentences.english: Bars and restaurants sit alongside industrial machinery and colossal container ships.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧和餐館就坐落於工業機械和龐大的集裝箱船旁邊。

definition: not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
